course.subject: FINA
course.name: Alternative Investments
course.description: This course introduces students to selected topics in alternative investment strategies. It covers the basic concepts of quantitative investment strategies, investment strategies based on big-data science, real asset investment, risk arbitrage, convertible bond arbitrage, and concludes with the topic on the investment in retail financial products.
course.prerequisites: FINA 5120 AND FINA 5290
